alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar; Effingham; Jasper; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Coles, southern Edgar, northwestern Jasper, northern Clark, southeastern Shelby, Cumberland and Effingham Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Clinton, Indiana to near Beecher City, Illinois. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Teutopolis and Watson around 1235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Montrose. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 152 and 188. Interstate 70 between mile markers 79 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar; Effingham; Jasper; Shelby
